core:process.core:comment: Captures the gift card number and looks it up the IIN table. Loads the card type and gift card type records. If not in the IIN table and type is not specified, prompts for gift card type. Sets card details and basic properties on the gift card details object.

core:action.core:name: Load Tender
core:action.core:comment: Currently still supports loading gift card card type if set but there is minimal effect and it is no longer actually supported in IIN range configuration.

core:action.core:name: Card NUmber Lookup
core:action.core:comment: Lookup card number on IIN range table. If found, lookup the card type to get the gift card type id. If not found, or no card type is set, we prompt for gift card type.

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: We support loading of a GiftCardCardType but this can be replaced by setting the GiftCardType directly on the IINRange and leaving CardType unset.

core:assignAction.core:comment: Sets properties on the gift card basket item details.

core:action.core:comment: Defensive only to create GiftCardDetails object if the item doesn't.

core:assignAction.core:comment: Set GiftCardType key from card type or iin range

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: If parsedData is set a validator must have been applied

core:assignAction.core:comment: Attempt to extract embedded card number from a custom field validator.
